bibl.title: Joseph Deveriske v. Territory of Washington. Subpoena
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: District Court of the Territory of Washington

body.p: The Territory of Washington, County of Spokane. People of the Territory of Washington Plaintiff vs Joseph Deveriske Defendant In the District Court of the Territory of Washington, in and the Fourth Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Spokane Falls, Spokane Country, in said Territory.

TO THE SHERIFF OF James Glispin COUNTY GREETING: IN THE NAME OF THE UNITED STATES, You are hereby commanded to Summon J.R. Snyder to be and appear before the judge of said Court in chambers in the Hyde Block in this city of Spokane Falls at 10 o'clock a.m. on June 20th 1888, and bring with him the papers and record in the case of People vs. Deverske decided April 7, 1888 to be and appear before the District Court at the Court House, in Spokane Falls, in said County, on the ___ day of ___ A.D. 188_ at ___ o'clock to there give evidence in the above entitled cause on part of said Joseph Deverske there to remain until discharged.

WITNESS the Hon. L.Borach Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of Washington Territory, and Judge said Court, and the Seal thereof affixed, this 19th day of April. A.D. 1888 D.A. Clement, Clerk. By Chaz B. Johnston, Deputy.

Territory of Washington County of Spokane SS. I hereby certify that I served the within Subpoena on the within named witness by reading the same to him in said County, on this 20th day of April A.D. 1888 James Glispin Fees Serve 40 Mileage 20 60

Case No. 2167 SUBPOENA In the District Court of the Territory of Washington, and for the Fourth Judicial District thereof holding terms at Spokane Falls, Spokane County, in said Territory. People Plaintiff. Joseph Deverske Defendant.
Returned and filed this 23rd day of April A.D. 1888 D.A. Clement, Clerk. By ___ Deputy.
SHERIFFS FEES. Serving_____names at 40 40 Mileage_____miles at 10 20 Total - - - - - $60.00
